meaning_str.bing:
adv. 可能；或许；尽可能；强调惊奇、恼怒等
网络. 可能地；也许；或者

可能；或许；尽可能；强调惊奇、恼怒等

或许；可能；可能地；也许；或许；大概；恐怕；不妨；说不定；有机会；有可能性

1.en: These ideas are possibly new to you now, but as you get used to us and learn more about us it will all seem so familiar to you.
1.cn: 这些想法对你们来说现在可能是全新的，不过，当你们适应了我们并且关于我们知道的更多的时候，一切对你们来说似乎是如此地熟悉。

2.en: Amaury also chatted about this possibly being the end of the series for Prison Break. "I think it could be a good place to stop. "
2.cn: 同时他也聊到了《越狱》有可能即将完结：“我觉得是时候好聚好散了吧。”

3.en: Your system clock appears to have been set back, possibly in an attempt to defeat the security system on this program.
3.cn: 你的系统时钟出现了回倒，有可能通过此程序攻击你的安全系统。

0.en: And possibly most damning of all, the police arrested someone else for this murder.
0.cn: 也许最糟糕的是，警察曾逮捕过另一名嫌犯。

1.en: Perhaps I can contact you, possibly through my poetry falcon. Poetry falcon. I like that.
1.cn: 也许我可以透过我的诗鹰联系你。诗鹰，我喜欢。

2.en: I'm hearing now that the president received at least one gunshot to the abdomen, possibly more, that he clutched his stomach, that he fell instantly to the ground, and there were screams, people panicking, that it has been very chaotic at that scene.
2.cn: 导播现在告诉我总统至少腹部中了一枪，也许不止，他紧捂腹部，立即倒地，现场尖叫连连，人群陷入恐慌，场面十分混乱。

3.cn: 怎么可以呢？为什么不行?

4.cn: 或者在北卡罗来纳的杜伦。

5.en: How can you possibly lose? Like this.
5.cn: 你怎么可能输呢？像这样。

6.en: Are you just making this up? Possibly.

7.en: I can't do that. I couldn't possibly do that.
7.cn: 我不能这么做，我不可能这么做。

8.en: This can't possibly... I can't, can't. I can't...
8.cn: 这不可能... 我不能，不能，我不能...

9.en: Oh, please, how could I possibly devastate Howard?
9.cn: 请问，我怎么可能把霍华德弄崩溃？

10.en: You can't know that. How can you possibly know that?
10.cn: 你怎么知道，你怎么可能知道？

11.en: Really? LeVar Burton's coming here? Possibly. I Tweeted him.
11.cn: 真的吗？勒瓦尔·布尔顿也要来吗？可能，我在推特上联系他了。

12.en: Attlee. He couldn't possibly be talking about that "Syndicate"?
12.cn: 艾德礼，他说的不会是那个"辛迪加"吧？

13.en: I have a meeting after the game. You're going to the game? Yeah. Possibly. Possibly.
13.cn: 比赛后我有个会，你们也去看比赛? 是的，有可能。有可能。

14.en: All right, then go. Listen to you. How can I possibly go?
14.cn: 那就去呗。听听你说的话，我怎么去啊？

15.en: I just need to know, how could these possibly be collated?
15.cn: 我想知道，这些债券是怎么过审的？

16.en: I owe her more than I can possibly fathom. And she owes me.
16.cn: 我欠她太多，多到我无法想象。而她也欠我。

17.en: Well, with you around, how could I ever possibly get Lucas alone?
17.cn: 有你在这边晃悠，我怎么可能跟卢卡斯单独相处？

18.en: Sweetie, you can't possibly remember that. You were barely a year old.
18.cn: 宝贝，你不可能记得的，当时你还不满一岁。

19.en: We killed a lot, but we saved more lives than you can possibly imagine.
19.cn: 我们杀了很多人，但我们拯救的生命多得超乎你们的想象。
